<style>
/* Bullet markers + basic layout */
.trestles .content ul > li::marker { color: #BF5700 !important; }

.button-row {
  margin: 1rem 0 0.5rem 0;
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}
.btn{
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 0.55rem 0.95rem;
  border-radius: 9999px;
  border: 1px solid #BF5700;
  font-weight: 600;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: all 120ms ease;
}
.btn:hover{ background-color: #BF5700; color: #fff !important; }

/* Optional: slightly narrower text column */
.trestles .content { max-width: 720px; }
</style>

<script>
// Force burnt-orange via inline styles after DOM is ready
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
  const ut = '#BF5700';
  // Color every element in the postcard (both columns)
  document.querySelectorAll('.postcard, .postcard *').forEach(el => {
    el.style.color = ut;
  });
  // Button borders + hover behavior
  document.querySelectorAll('.btn').forEach(btn => {
    btn.style.color = ut;
    btn.style.borderColor = ut;
    btn.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => { btn.style.backgroundColor = ut; btn.style.color = '#fff'; });
    btn.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => { btn.style.backgroundColor = ''; btn.style.color = ut; });
  });
});
</script>
